content: "Paint a photorealistic portrait of a young man standing in a lush, green forest, surrounded by tall trees and ferns. The man is lost in thought, with a contemplative expression on his face as he gazes up at the canopy of leaves above. In the background, a small stream should be visible, with sunlight filtering through the trees and casting a warm, golden glow over the scene. Use advanced techniques such as lighting and shading to create a highly realistic image."
